name: RYN_WHT_PCP_PROPH_SCRN
description: Stores data for Ryan White CAREWare PCP Prophylaxis screenings.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RW_PCP_PROPH_DATE
columns.description: The date of the PCP Prophylaxis screening.

columns.name: RW_PCP_PROPH_RSLT_C_NAME
columns.description: The result of the PCP Prophylaxis screening.

columns.name: RW_PCP_PROPH_SCORE
columns.description: The numerical score for the PCP Prophylaxis screening.

columns.name: RW_PCP_PROPH_CMTS
columns.description: The comments for the PCP Prophylaxis screening.
